function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate natural ventilation leading to increased risk of infection transmission","Impact":"Higher risk of contagion and spread of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Integration of approved mechanical ventilation and hybrid ventilation strategies","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, hybrid ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Ineffective mechanical ventilation leading to widespread contagion in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion and spread of contagious diseases within the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementation of approved mechanical ventilation and monitoring of air distribution patterns","Technologies":"Mechanical ventilation systems, airflow monitoring technology","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Facility managers, building maintenance personnel"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation channel design leading to limited air exchange and circulation","Impact":"Higher risk of infection transmission due to poor air quality and inadequate ventilation","Mitigation":"Incorporation of courtyard designs to create integrated ventilation channels and cohesive ventilation passages","Technologies":"Courtyard design, ventilation channel design, airflow management systems","People":"Building occupants, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Architects, building designers, facility managers"}]}
